events.message: I recently received my order, but the product is defective. There are visible scratches and it does not function properly.
The customer's issue has been identified as a product defect related to damage and functional problems.
The support case has been assigned to an agent specialized in product defects and returns.
Hello, I understand your product arrived damaged and faulty. I’m here to help you get this sorted out as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and any malfunction you are experiencing with the product?
I have attached several images showing the scratches on the surface and the device turning off unexpectedly after just a few minutes.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement unit shipped immediately or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know which option suits you best.
I appreciate the quick response. I would like to receive the replacement unit as soon as possible, please proceed with that.
We have processed your replacement order, and you will receive tracking information shortly. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Just checking in to ensure that your replacement product arrived in good condition and is functioning as expected.
The replacement arrived yesterday, and everything is working perfectly now. Thank you for your assistance.
Your case has been closed following confirmation of the replacement’s successful delivery and operation. Please contact us if you need further help.
